name: attain
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C1 to reach or succeed in getting something: He has attained the highest grade in his music exams. We need to identify the best ways of attaining our objectives/goals. India attained independence in 1947, after decades of struggle. Synonyms
accomplish
achieve
fulfil (MAKE HAPPEN) mainly UK
reach
realize (ACHIEVE)
Thesaurus: synonyms, antonyms, and examples
to achieve somethingachieveAfter years of rejection, she finally achieved success on the big screen.fulfilI fulfilled my dreams of becoming a marine biologist.realizeUK There was nothing to prevent her from realising her ambitions.come trueI worked so hard to be a doctor, and now my dream has come true.accomplishThese goals will be extremely hard to accomplish.attainAfter years of struggle, the nation attained independence.

to achieve something difficult to do or obtain: You need financial security in order to attain emotional well-being. attainable adjective us
